overview: Even if you think you can't dance, Shaun will have you grooving from the very start with his Mark It and Move It technique. Learn moves like the "Shimmy," "Cha Cha Cha," and "Cross and Roll." You're enrolled in Groove 101 and this is just a taste of all the fun to come!
tagline: Want to get a Rockin' Body?
title: Rockin' Body: Mark, Move & Groove
